caption:
India's higher education landscape is at a crossroads — Will online learning completely reshape education, or will traditional classrooms continue to lead the way?

This session brings together influential voices from both sides of the discussion:
▶️ How are online models redefining accessibility, flexibility, and scale?
▶️ What are the challenges offline institutions face in staying relevant in an increasingly digital world?
▶️ Which model better suits rising costs, job market demands, and shifting student expectations?

Don't miss the chance to hear from thought leaders and disruptors on this critical issue.

Join Carissa Little, Nishant Chandra, Chaitanya Chitta, Siddharth Banerjee, and moderator Hari Krishnan Nair in this provocative conversation.

📅 February 3–5, 2025
📍 The Oberoi, Gurgaon
🎟️ Register now for the ASU+GSV & Emeritus Summit: https://emrt.us/eag25ig

#Emeritus #AllEyesOnIndia #ASUGSVEmeritusSummit #EdTech
